    Interface RecurringPaymentData

    interface RecurringPaymentData {
        country: string;
        createdOn: Date;
        currency: string;
        details: string;
        encodedHHUpdateAccount?: string;
        expiry: Date;
        fixAmount?: number;
        frequency:
            | "NONE"
            | "HALF_HOURLY"
            | "HOURLY"
            | "DAILY"
            | "WEEKLY"
            | "MONTHLY"
            | "YEARLY";
        maxAmount?: number;
        merchantAccount: string;
        merchantId?: string;
        merchantName?: string;
        payerAccount: string;
        payerCurrency: string;
        reference?: string;
        start: Date;
        status?: "ACTIVE"
        | "SUSPENDED"
        | "CANCELLED";
        thumbnail?: string;
        title?: string;
        type?: string;
        updatedOn: Date;
        useDroppCredit?: boolean;
    }
